data.title: Downtown Houston, TX
data.meta_description: Grotto Downtown is located at Avenida Houston, connected to George R. Brown Convention Center near Discovery Green. Renowned for its classic italian dishes.
data.text:
Hours & Location

1001 Avenida de las Americas, Suite A,

Houston, TX 77010

(713) 658-0752

SUN: 12:00 PM - 9:00 PM

MON - WED: 11:30 AM - 9:00 PM

THU - FRI: 11:30 AM - 10:00 PM

SAT: 12:00 PM - 10:00 PM

Pick Up:

Order Online

Delivery:

GrubhubDoorDashPostmatesUberEats

Additional Info

Conveniently located at Avenida Houston and connected to the George R. Brown Convention Center, Grotto Downtown offers a chic, vibrant dining experience in the heart of Houston--within walking distance to Minute Maid Park, Toyota Center and Discovery Green. Unlike any other Grotto, Downtown offers a new look with a rustic, warehouse style interior and exposed brick. From small and shareable plates, fresh and local salads to refreshing and dynamic Italian cuisine, Grotto's menu also offers a selection of curated craft beers, Grappa and wine--the ideal place for any occasion whether it's lunch, happy hour, a business meeting or dinner in the city.

Make Reservations
